title: CTSR Vendor System Upload Schema
description: JSON Schema for vendor/CRO system instance data uploads to the Clinical Trial Systems Register. Version 1.1 adds data hosting region, supported studies, structured interfaces, and validation evidence links.

vendor_code.description: Unique vendor identifier assigned by Novo Nordisk (e.g., ICON_CRO, IQVIA_LABS)

upload_type.description: FULL replaces all instances for this vendor, INCREMENTAL updates only included instances

contact_email.description: Contact email for queries about this upload

system_instances.description: Array of system instances managed by this vendor

instance_code.description: Unique identifier for this instance (vendor-assigned). Allows mixed case, numbers, underscores, and hyphens.

platform_vendor_code.description: Platform vendor code if different from uploading vendor (e.g., MEDIDATA, VEEVA)

platform_name.description: Name of the platform/product (e.g., Medidata Rave EDC)

instance_name.description: Descriptive name for this instance (e.g., ICON Managed Rave Production)

instance_environment.description: Environment type - typically PRODUCTION for trial use

system_category.description: System category code per CTSR taxonomy

validation_status.description: Current validation status of the system instance

validation_expiry.description: Date when validation expires and re-assessment is due (YYYY-MM-DD)

validation_evidence_link.description: Link to Validation Summary Report or Certificate in Vendor/Sponsor DMS

hosting_model.description: Hosting/deployment model. SAAS_ST = SaaS Single Tenant

data_hosting_region.description: Primary physical location of data storage (Critical for GDPR/Schrems II compliance)

description.description: Free-text description of the system instance and its purpose

supported_studies.description: List of Sponsor Protocol IDs (e.g., NN1234-5678) active on this instance. Critical for impact analysis. Validated against CTMS.

interfaces.description: Structured details on system integrations and data flows

date.description: Date of the last major change (YYYY-MM-DD)

last_major_change.description: Information about the most recent major change/upgrade

date.description: Planned date of next major change (YYYY-MM-DD)

part11_compliant.description: Whether the system is 21 CFR Part 11 compliant

annex11_compliant.description: Whether the system is EU Annex 11 compliant

soc2_certified.description: Whether the system/vendor has SOC 2 certification

iso27001_certified.description: Whether the system/vendor has ISO 27001 certification

is_active.description: Set to false to mark instance as decommissioned

system_name.description: Name of the connected system (e.g., Central Lab LIMS, Safety Database)

direction.description: Direction of data flow relative to this system

data_type.description: Type of data exchanged (e.g., Subject Demographics, Lab Results, AE Reports)
